notebookSelector.title: Citronote
notebookSelector.readAboutBeta: Before using, please read <1>About Citronote 3 Beta</1>

addNotebookPage.description: A notebook is the top-level unit in Citronote. It manages notes, folders, and more together.
addNotebookPage.alreadyAdded: This folder has already been added as a notebook
addNotebookPage.folderExists: The notebook will be saved to {{nbLocationDisplay}}.
addNotebookPage.betaWarning1: Since this is a beta version for testing purposes, incompatible and destructive changes may occur. Do not store important data.
addNotebookPage.betaWarning2: The beta version is currently not compatible with notebooks from Citronote v2. Please do not add Citronote v2 notebooks.

editorPane.unsupportedFile: This file cannot be opened in Citronote

description.browser: The contents of the notebook will remain on your computer and can be added again.
description.desktop: The contents of the notebook will remain in {{location}} and can be added again.
